question.body: Which cells of the pancreas have an exocrine function?

response.feedback: Incorrect. Alpha cells secrete the hormone glucagon so are endocrine cells.
Incorrect. Beta cells secrete the hormone insulin so are endocrine cells.
Incorrect. Delta cells secretes the hormone somatostatin so are endocrine cells.
Correct. Acinar cells secrete pancreatic juice into a duct so it is an exocrine gland.
